products.title: Bella Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black vertical blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout vertical blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first.

products.title: Bella Noir Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured blackout fabric available in a range of colours. Dim out options available in the splash range. Bella noir vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Bella Noir (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
